title: Forex Ponzi Schemes: The Illusion of Guaranteed Profits
excerpt: Many so-called forex ‘investment clubs’ lure traders with unrealistic promises...
body: Ponzi schemes in forex often disguise themselves as managed account services or investment pools.
Scammers promise guaranteed returns of 20–50% monthly — something no legitimate forex firm can sustain.
Always check if the firm is licensed with a recognized regulator, and beware of platforms that push referrals or bonuses for recruiting others.

title: Crypto Exchange Exit Scams: How to Spot and Avoid
excerpt: Not all platforms are what they claim — here’s how to identify red flags before depositing your funds...
body: Exit scams occur when fraudulent crypto exchanges suddenly shut down and disappear with users’ deposits.
Warning signs include: unrealistic returns, unverified licenses, poor liquidity, and sudden withdrawal issues.
To protect yourself: use only regulated exchanges, enable two-factor authentication, and never leave large balances on platforms.

title: Romance Scams on the Rise: Protecting Your Heart and Wallet
excerpt: Fraudsters exploit emotions to trick victims into sending money...
body: Romance scams usually begin on dating apps or social media, where criminals build trust over weeks or months.
They fabricate emergencies — medical bills, travel issues, or sudden crises — and pressure victims to send money.
Never send funds to someone you’ve never met in person, and be wary if they avoid video calls or push for secrecy.

title: Tax Fraud Scams: Don’t Fall for Fake IRS and Revenue Agents
excerpt: Scammers impersonate tax authorities to intimidate victims into paying fake debts...
body: Tax scams spike around filing season, with criminals calling, emailing, or texting victims while posing as tax officers.
They claim unpaid taxes, threaten arrests, or demand immediate payments via gift cards or crypto wallets.
Real tax agencies never demand payment over the phone or request gift cards. Always verify notices directly from official websites before taking action.
